kickstart.post:
MANPATH /opt/mpich/gnu/man
files=`find /opt/mpich -name "mpirun.args"` for f in $files do sed -e 's|MPI_HOST=`hostname`|FQDN=`hostname` \ MPI_HOST=`expr $FQDN : "\\([^\\.]*\\).*"`|' $f > /tmp/mpirun.args mv /tmp/mpirun.args $f done

/opt/openmpi/lib/ /opt/openmpi/lib/openmpi/
PATH=$PATH:/opt/openmpi/bin/
if ( ${?path} ) then set path=( $path /opt/openmpi/bin/ ) else set path=( /opt/openmpi/bin ) endif
/sbin/ldconfig
